name: ProjectMemelord - Greg & PD 3: Army of Dankness Alpha (2020/03/17)
name_original: ProjectMemelord - Greg & PD 3: Army of Dankness Alpha (2020/03/17)
description:
Made this one almost entirely in 48 hours thanks to Unreal constantly shitting the bed even once as far as completely erasing 90% of the entire project.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

After their daring escape from the Lair of the Dead Meme last term, Greg & PD make their way to the final frontier: SPACE. Greg has been informed by the lord of memes, Christ Chan that the universe must be cleansed of all but table. At his behest, Greg & PD set out on what could be their final mission: To destroy all the universe’s table until nothing remains but table.
